sourcesContent: import { Grid, makeStyles, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import React from 'react' import Navigation from '../components/Navigation' import demo from '../image/demo.gif' const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ container: { backgroundColor: '#f4f5fd', width: '90%', marginTop: '20px', margin: '0 auto', height: '80vh', '& img':{ height: '100%', width: '100%' } } })) function SingleProduct() { const classes = useStyles() return ( <> My Product lorem ispsum is a dummy text just to fill the content dummy text just to fill the content dummy text just to fill the content ) } export default SingleProduct
